title: when your team surrenders
body:
because the mid lane voli got a few kills and its one for all khazix vs voli
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/097/663/whywouldyoudothat.jpg?1318992465

this just happened

replies.body:
> Mid lane voli

So this in bronze 5 and some noob got wrecked bycause someone made a nonmeta pick, they cant adapt, and the only answer?

RAGEQUIT.
you missed the "One for all" part there
I think you forgot to read everything there buddy

its not like a bunch of assassins can win against a bunch of tanks :(

I'll probably have that reaction first when I see them all building ghost blade and dusk blades (see my all for 1 game as zed VS mundo). I was sad with how they built.
because this mode sucks it should have 80 % cd like urf caus it takes 25 mins for most champ to start doing something.
